name: TeqBlazeAppLovinMAXAdapter
summary: TeqBlaze AppLovin MAX adapter for iOS
description:
Elevate your app's monetization strategy with TeqBlazeSDK, your go-to solution for both iOS and Android. Our SDK facilitates direct app integration and supports publishers using platforms like Applovin Max, Admob, and Ironsource. Looking for Unity app compatibility? We’ve got you covered there too, ensuring smooth mediation across various frameworks.
TeqBlazeSDK is designed to adapt seamlessly to your existing setup or can spearhead new advertising strategies, offering a rich array of ad formats from HTML and video banners to interstitials and in-app native ads. Maintain compliance effortlessly with key regulatory frameworks and enhance user engagement through advanced features such as event tracking and first-party data collection.
Opt for our customizable options within our white-label SSP+ad exchange setup or as a standalone product, and capitalize on early-bird pricing to get ahead. Revolutionize your mobile advertising with TeqBlazeSDK — where cutting-edge technology meets unmatched flexibility.
